thoughts.text: I need to replace the <download_link> placeholder in the execute_shell command with the actual download link for Rosetta Stone. I can use the get_hyperlinks command to get the download link for Rosetta Stone.
thoughts.reasoning: By using the get_hyperlinks command, I can get the download link for Rosetta Stone. This will help me replace the <download_link> placeholder in the execute_shell command and download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to get the download link for Rosetta Stone
- Use the execute_shell command to download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine
- Use the app to learn different languages
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on language learning apps. It's important to also practice speaking and listening to the language with native speakers.
thoughts.speak: I need to replace the <download_link> placeholder in the execute_shell command with the actual download link for Rosetta Stone. I can use the get_hyperlinks command to get the download link for Rosetta Stone. What is the URL for the website where I can download Rosetta Stone?
